reviews.review_msg: No exams, weekly quizzes, two presentations and a final paper. Dr. C is a kind and thoughtful prof, models his lectures on papers, cares about material and his students. there were no issues with his accent. you get what you put in, you learn more if you go over the papers presented. would take a course with him again

Thick accent made it tough to understand lecture material, which wasn't a huge deal since there were no midterm or final exams. All marks based on a final term paper and two presentations. Not the most interesting class, and minimal effort required with respect to other 400 MBB courses.
